title: School Disaster Preparedness Training: Strengthening Crisis Response Competencies via Problem-Based Learning (PBL)

context.prior_knowledge: Basic knowledge of school safety management and comprehension of disaster-type characteristics
context.additional_context: Participants consist of school staff and local disaster managers, enhancing collaborative and decision-making competencies in real disaster scenarios. They utilize digital devices for real-time data analysis and simulations.

learning_goals: Participants can establish and execute effective evacuation plans within a short warning time of 11 minutes
Participants develop customized response strategies to protect vulnerable groups in schools (special education students, individuals with disabilities, etc.)
Participants design role allocation and collaboration protocols among faculty, students, and local agencies during disasters
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
